title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using Build 20011106, with a .java file open in the editor and clicking the new class button while checking 'Enclosing Type,' the 'Enclosing Type' field is blank.
EB: When using Build 20011106, with a .java file open in the editor, clicking the new class button while checking 'Enclosing Type,' the 'Enclosing Type' field should default to the current type in the editor.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Open a .java file in the editor using Build 20011106. 
2. Click on the 'New Class' button. 
3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' option. 
4. Observe that the 'Enclosing Type' field is blank when it should default to the current type in the editor.
